Blang Krueng Jadi Desa dengan Pemanfaatan Dana Desa Terbaik
01 Nov 2019, 01:48 by Faidah Umu Sofuroh


Foto: kemendes PDTT

Jakarta - Geliat pembangunan di perdesaan makin tampak, desa-desa terus didorong untuk berkembang dan mandiri. Salah satunya di Desa Blang Krueng, Kecamatan Baitussalam, Kabupaten Aceh Besar, Provinsi Aceh.
Kepala Desa Blang Krueng, Nasrudin M Syam, mengatakan sejak lahirnya UU Desa dan sejak adanya dana desa, Kampung Blang Krueng jadi lebih baik. Berbagai capaian yang diraih menurutnya tak lepas dari partisipasi aktif masyarakat.
"Musyawarah merupakan kunci paling penting dalam melibatkan partisipasi masyarakat untuk pembangunan desa," ujarnya dalam keterangan tertulis, Kamis (31/10/2019).
Ia juga mengatakan bahwa pengawasan penggunaan dana desa harus dilakukan oleh berbagai pihak baik BPD maupun masyarakat. Sejalan dengan hal tersebut, mantan Kepala Desa Blang Krueng dari 2013-2019, Teuku Muslem mengatakan pelibatan masyarakat dan transparansi yang membuat Blang Krueng bangkit dari ketertinggalannya.
"Dana desa ini amanah untuk kheucik (kepala desa), pertanggungjawaban antar kheucik. Harus transparan dengan masyarakat, musrenbang di desa. Informasi harus jelas, ada baliho. Musrembang harus terbuka, libatkan semua masyarakat," pesannya.
Selain itu, menurutnya antarkheucik harus kompak, karena kheucik sebagai ujung tombak kampung. Kekompakan dan kejujuran pemimpin yang membuat Blang Krueng mendapatkan penghargaan.
Sementara itu Kepala Dinas DPMG Kabupaten Aceh Besar, Bahrul Jamil menjelaskan bahwa dana desa itu digunakan untuk pembangunan yang tidak mungkin dibangun oleh APBD. Misal jembatan gantung, alat pengangkut manusia di daerah-daerah perbatasan.
Di Kabupaten Aceh Besar terdiri dari 604 desa, 23 kecamatan, proses pelaksanaan musrenbang 90%, dan penyerapan dana desa 100%. Sehingga mendapat penghargaan proses peluncuran dana desa terbaik di Provinsi Aceh. Tahun ini mewajibkan satu desa bangun rehab 5 rumah dan program Desa Bersih. Semua yang menyangkut sampah menjadi tanggung jawab desa.
"Dengan adanya dana desa, pembangunan desa membaik. Kalau 2018 desa sangat tertinggal ada 18, di 2019 hanya 1 desa sangat tertinggal. Pada 2018 terdiri dari 126 desa tertinggal, di 2019 berkurang menjadi 94 desa tertinggal. Pada 2018 terdiri dari 439 desa berkembang, di 2019 bertambah menjadi 460 desa berkembang, untuk desa maju bertambah dari 19 menjadi 40 desa maju di 2019, dan tercipta desa maju di 2019," terangnya.
Advisor Menteri Bidang Data dan Informasi, Roosary Tyas Wardani, mengatakan tata kelola administrasi perlu di sempurnakan. Menurutnya harus ada partisipasi, transparansi, akuntable, sinergi dan kolaborasi. Keempatnya dilakukan untuk menyusun RAPDes. Semua perencanaan sudah berbasis masyarakat.
"Penting juga penguatan SDM di desa tujuannya agar apa yang sudah dirumuskan bisa diwujudkan. SDM desa yang unggul diharapkan bisa menciptakan kreativitas dan inovasi desa, dan diharapkan akan maju melalui akdemi desa 4.0," pungkasnya. text:
Blang Krueng Becomes the Village with the Best Utilization of Village Funds
Nov 01 2019, 01:48 by Faidah Umu Sofuroh


Photo: Kemendes PDTT

Jakarta - Stretching development in rural areas increasingly visible, villages continue to be encouraged to develop and be independent. One of them is in Blang Krueng Village, Baitussalam District, Aceh Besar Regency, Aceh Province.
Head of Blang Krueng Village, Nasrudin M Syam, said that since the birth of the Village Law and since the existence of village funds, Blang Krueng Village has become better. According to him, the various achievements achieved are inseparable from the active participation of the community.
"Deliberation is the most important key in involving community participation in village development," he said in a written statement, Thursday (10/31/2019).
He also said that supervision of the use of village funds must be carried out by various parties both BPD and the community. In line with this, the former Head of the Blang Krueng Village from 2013-2019, Teuku Muslem said that community involvement and transparency made Blang Krueng rise from his backwardness.
"The village fund is mandated for kheucik (village head), accountability between kheucik. It must be transparent with the community, musrenbang in the village. Information must be clear, there is a billboard. Musrembang must be open, involve all communities," he said.
In addition, according to him, the intercultural must be compact, because kheucik is the spearhead of the village. The cohesiveness and honesty of the leader that made Blang Krueng get an award.
Meanwhile, Head of the Aceh Besar Regency DPMG Office, Bahrul Jamil explained that the village funds were used for development that could not have been built by the APBD. For example a suspension bridge, a means of transporting people in border areas.
In Aceh Besar District, it consists of 604 villages, 23 sub-districts, 90% of the Musrenbang implementation process, and 100% absorption of village funds. So that he was honored with the process of launching the best village fund in Aceh Province. This year requires a village to build 5 houses and a Clean Village program. Everything related to waste becomes the responsibility of the village.
"With the existence of village funds, village development has improved. If 2018 villages are very underdeveloped there are 18, in 2019 only 1 village is very underdeveloped. In 2018 consisting of 126 underdeveloped villages, in 2019 reduced to 94 underdeveloped villages. In 2018 consisting of 439 developing villages, "in 2019 there will be 460 developing villages, developing villages will increase from 19 to 40 developed villages in 2019, and developed villages will be created in 2019," he explained.
Advisor to the Minister for Data and Information, Roosary Tyas Wardani, said that administrative governance needs to be improved. According to him there must be participation, transparency, accountability, synergy and collaboration. All four were carried out to prepare the RAPDes. All planning is community based.
"It is also important to strengthen the human resources in the village so that what has been formulated can be realized. A superior village human resource is expected to create village creativity and innovation, and is expected to progress through the village acdemi 4.0," he concluded.
